alert.note: Alert for Caddo (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 06 at 5:49PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT SOUTHWESTERN CADDO PARISH... SOUTHEASTERN HARRISON AND NORTHEASTERN PANOLA COUNTIES THROUGH 615 PM CDT... At 549 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms over Elysian Fields, or 15 miles southeast of Marshall, moving southwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Marshall, Waskom, Deberry, Elysian Fields, Scottsville, Jonesville, Midyett, Front, and Spring Ridge. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
